team.title: President
team.name: Kelsang Jinpa
team.description: 10 + years of experience in translation and content creation. Strong organizational and communication skills.

team.title: Accountant
team.name: Tenzin Gyurmey
team.description: Since 2018, serving as a news reporter and anchor for Voice of Tibet, a Tibetan shortwave radio station located in Dharmsala, Himachal Pradesh.

team.title: Vice President
team.name: Tenzin Nyidon
team.description: Tenzin Nyidon, a reporter at Phayul.com, completed her Masters in International Relations at Jawaharlal Nehru University. With experience since January 2022, she specializes in producing analytical reports and video news for the leading English-language Tibetan exile news outlet.

process.title: Funding
process.description: ATJ is Dependent of grant-aid and sponsorship for its income. The association is registered in India, Himachal Pradesh under the Societies Registration Act XXI of 1860 as a non-profit organization.

process.title: Research
process.description: During the initial consultation, we will discuss your business goals and objectives, target audience, and current marketing efforts. This will allow us to understand your needs and tailor our services to best fit your requirements.
